channel.title: Clay to soft clay
channel.description: does anyone kow of a script to turn clay into soft clay ( using the clay with a bucket of water )

item.title: Clay to soft clay
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

i know how, but unless soemone already has a script, or they wwill make one without me doing anyhting, no thanks

srl is pretty simple

Read full topic

item.title: Clay to soft clay
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:4, topic:143674”][quote author=MujaheD link=topic=197067.msg1760338#msg1760338 date=1189956734]
Just post an image of clay and an image of a filled bucket and i can do it for you without banking. P.s For free
[/quote]There’s no point to make a script which uses clay on bucket of water if it doesn’t have banking, it would fail immediately because you could make 14 soft clay per inv and then it would stop instead of banking? What a lame ass script would that be.[/quote]

Good point, im sorry but i dont play runescape anymore… If i was to add a banking procedure then i would have to use SRL, which i dont mind but im pretty sure bobby would get confused, if you know how to use SRL let me know and i will see if i can do it.

Read full topic
